about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered why you don't have a girlfriend? Or have you ever wondered if you will ever find a girlfriend? Sometimes it doesn't take much to meet a beautiful foxy girl... Just go to a cafe for coffee in time, and have a little perseverance and desire...

The DLC contains adult content, that unlocks the entire content of the base game.
This free dlc adds more juicy poses for adults only.
Discover the foxgirl in a new way by completing the puzzles, and collect her in your collection!
Here you will open the entire gallery, play with one hand!

And shibari! Don't forget that she loves shibari!

Easy win: Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level

In the game, your goal is to collect the puzzle in order to restore the pictures. (◕‿◕)♡

Special Features

  • 🦊 Well-drawn backgrounds and CGs
  • 🦊 Live2D dynamic character
  • 🦊 One-handed mode
  • 🦊 CG Gallery Mode
  • 🦊 Relaxing music
  • 🦊 Puzzle game

content_descriptors.notes:
-Nudity or sexual content
-Not suitable for watching at work
-Not suitable for all ages
-All characters in the game are over 18 years old

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: with 1 GB VRAM compatible with DirectX
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
